name: Stop, Please
description:
Stop Please is a point & click videogame, based in detection and interaction with elements, developed as a final students project. 

It sets in a cyberpunk dystopia, where the player controls an orbit camera around a diorama. The main mechanic consists of detecting and photographing the required vehicles before they scape. This mechanic is later complemented with bomb misions against the clock and protection misions and escort.

The player can make a decission before the final level that will condition the ending.
